data.englishTranslation: When something happened that pleased him, he would say: 'Praise is to Allah Who by His blessings all good things are perfected.' And if something happened that displeased him, he would say: 'Praise is to Allah in all circumstances.'
data.transliteration: Alhamdu lillaahil-lathee bini'matihi tatimmus-saalihaat. (1) Alhamdu lillaahi 'alaa kulli haal. (2)
data.arabicVerse: (1) الْحَمْدُ للَّهِ الَّذِي بِنِعْمَتِهِ تَتِمُّ الصَّالِحَاتُ (2) الْحَمْدُ للَّهِ عَلَى كُلِّ حَالٍ
